timeline_events.event: Year-end adjustments and inter-company interest payment

timeline_events.significance: Completion of Villa Via's financial year showing R3.7M profit from rental income

timeline_events.event: Major service expansion with multiple enterprise services (R100,000+)

timeline_events.event: Final balance showing persistent debt despite payments (R1,035,361.34)
timeline_events.significance: Debt continues to grow despite payment claims

timeline_events.event: Additional false payment claims totaling R765,361.34

timeline_events.event: **CRITICAL EVENT** - Jax confronts Rynette about missing money, notifies that funds need to be paid to ReZonance & Kayla's estate
timeline_events.significance: Confrontation triggers coordinated cover-up activities

timeline_events.event: **CRITICAL EVENT** - Disappearance of all orders & audit trails from Shopify
timeline_events.significance: Systematic destruction of digital evidence (7 days after confrontation)

timeline_events.event: **CRITICAL EVENT** - Adderory (Rynette's son) purchases domain regimaskin.co.za
timeline_events.significance: Digital infrastructure control consolidation (14 days after confrontation)

timeline_events.event: **CRITICAL EVENT** - Cards cancelled secretly
timeline_events.significance: Financial control consolidation (23 days after confrontation)

timeline_events.significance: Regulatory compliance issues emerge

timeline_events.event: Daniel Faucitt clarifies company status and payment disputes
timeline_events.significance: Attempt to manage regulatory and financial disputes

entity_updates.title:
Summary

This document updates entity profiles and relationships based on the trustee appointment letter and August 2025 email evidence package. The new evidence reveals **The Faucitt Family Trust** as a critical asset protection vehicle, documents **Rynette's role as information gatekeeper to Bantjies**, and exposes **Bantjies' false impartiality** claims despite coordinating with Peter/Rynette.

---

## New Entity: The Faucitt Family Trust
entity_updates.content:
The Faucitt Family Trust emerges as a critical component of Peter's asset protection and control strategy. Established with registration number IT 3651/2013 and tax number 9132219271, the trust serves as a legal vehicle for consolidating control over business assets while creating barriers to claims from Dan and Jax.

The trustee appointment letter reveals a **41-day backdating scheme**, with the stated appointment date of July
